name: The Terminal Code
description:
Game description:

Bad things are about to happen unless you enter the 4-digit code. Wait! You don't know the code? Don't worry, for each digit there is a puzzle. Can you solve them all and reveal the code? Goodluck!

GBJAM

This game has been made during the gameboy game jam. We worked hard on turning this concept into a game and we welcome all the feedback we can get.

Greetings from the Netherlands!
Evert & Mart
